title: DeathSpank Thongs of Virtue [English/Spanish] [non-Steam]
description:
=====================================================================
DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue v1.0. Just install & play.
=====================================================================

English + fan made Spanish translation


=====================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
=====================================================================

- Custom installer compressed.
- Voices are in English. Texts are in English and Spanish (thanks to Juan Enrique LÃƒÂ³pez, Dlan group.).
- A trainer is included. Some antivirus might detect it as a virus. It is a false positive.


=====================================================================
Instructions:
=====================================================================

1. Run "DeathSpankThongsOfVirtue_Eng-Spa_JimbusEd.exe" to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.


=====================================================================
FAQ:
=====================================================================

Q: Does the local co-op work?
A: Yes.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No.

Q: Does it work under Windows 8?
A: It should work, but it has only been tested under Windows 7. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.
